CustomField.formula:
IF (ISBLANK(Start_Time__c), "",
IF(HOUR(Start_Time__c) <= 12, TEXT(HOUR(Start_Time__c)), TEXT(HOUR(Start_Time__c)-12)) & ":" &
IF (MINUTE(Start_Time__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MINUTE(Start_Time__c)), TEXT(MINUTE(Start_Time__c))) &
IF (HOUR(Start_Time__c) < 12, " AM", " PM"))
+ " - " +
IF (ISBLANK(End_Time__c), "",
IF(HOUR(End_Time__c) <= 12, TEXT(HOUR(End_Time__c)), TEXT(HOUR(End_Time__c)-12)) & ":" &
IF (MINUTE(End_Time__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MINUTE(End_Time__c)), TEXT(MINUTE(End_Time__c))) &
IF (HOUR(End_Time__c) < 12, " AM", " PM"))
CustomField.label: Time
